attributes.description:
This example is a 2015 Subaru Forester 2.5 XS Auto, It offers standard all-wheel drive, ample passenger space, and a base engine that's good on the road and it got an amazing off road capabilities.  It’s excellent in all-weather, off-pavement capability, superior safety ratings, and its reliability to keep going even after the miles pile on. It comes with power steering, electric windows, central locking remote, air conditioning, climate control, reverse camera,  front armrest, front electric seat, front electric seats, radio/CD player, roof racks, paddle shift, multi-functioning steering wheel and plenty of space for everyone on the vehicle to seat comfortably and relaxed. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.

attributes.title: 2009 Isuzu KB 300D-Teq Double-Cab LX

attributes.description:
Buying an older Land Cruiser worth it?

While no used car purchase can be a guaranteed sure thing, the Land Cruiser's reputation for durability, longevity and low maintenance costs, makes it one of the safer high-mileage vehicles one can buy.

Why do people like old Land Cruisers?

Lifelong Companionship. Another huge part of the Land Cruiser's appeal is its legendary longevity. Indeed, Land Cruisers are extremely highly rated in terms of reliability, and makeup one of the top 15 models of car that owners hang onto for the longest. Part of this is down to the engines.
